segments.text: I see the sunlight streaming through the window, illuminating everything in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, the moment feels misleadingly serene against the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s apron flutters slightly as she moves, absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the overflowing sink is becoming a ticking time bomb, and she doesn’t even know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a wave of frustration at her unawareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the boy! He's risking it all for a cookie; the thought makes me cringe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost as if I can hear the impending crash of the stool tipping over.
segments.speaker: PAR
